description: Test suite for the users router in a FastAPI application, containing unit tests for listing, creating, and retrieving users with mocked services.

classes.name: _FakeUsersService
classes.description: A mock service class to simulate user-related operations such as listing and creating users.

methods.name: test_users_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests that the user listing endpoint returns correct data with pagination parameters.

methods.name: test_users_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests that the user creation endpoint successfully creates a user and returns expected data.

methods.name: test_users_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests that fetching a non-existent user returns a 404 HTTP error.
